translation.zh: 其中《黑水晶》和《魔幻迷宫》占据了我绝大部分童年

translation.zh: 这些作品充满魅力

translation.en: Early memories I have of watching television with my father
translation.zh: 我记得小时候 跟爸爸一起看《大青蛙布偶秀》

translation.en: was The Muppet Show.
translation.zh: 跟爸爸一起看《大青蛙布偶秀》

translation.en: It was one of the few television shows he would watch.
translation.zh: 这是他会追看的少数电视节目之一

translation.en: And then, he took me to see The Dark Crystal movie when it was in its theatrical run,
translation.zh: 后来《黑水晶》上映时他带我到电影院去看

translation.en: and it was just something we'd never seen before.
translation.zh: 那是我们从未接触过的电影

translation.en: And it was so magical.
translation.zh: 整部电影充满奇幻魅力

translation.en: [Dave] I left the movie theater going, "Well, how... how did any of that happen?"
translation.zh: 我离开电影院后心想 “这是怎么弄出来的？”

translation.en: I got Podlings. I thought Podlings were a bit like Muppets. I get that.
translation.zh: 电影中有波丁人 我认为操纵波丁人有点像操纵布偶

translation.en: And then, everything else, I just wanted to know how.
translation.zh: 但我想知道怎么操纵其他角色

translation.en: It's a game-changing film.
translation.zh: 这是一部开创先例的电影

translation.en: So, if we go back and go, "Well, what can we do
translation.zh: 于是我们开始回想：“要怎么做

translation.en: to match the level of script quality,
translation.zh: 才能配合剧本质量

translation.en: art departments, set design, everything?"
translation.zh: 符合美术、设计等层面的要求？”

translation.en: With Dark Crystal, everything is built.
translation.zh: 《黑水晶》的人物场景都是做出来的

translation.en: Everything is made specifically just for us.
translation.zh: 一切都为这部剧集而设

translation.en: It's based in reality, something tangible,
translation.zh: 讲究真实、具体

translation.en: something that doesn't trick the eye.
translation.zh: 骗不了眼睛

translation.en: And the craftsmanship, the talent
translation.zh: 摄制组的道具手艺和挑选的人才

translation.en: that has been brought to the table, is just... it's mind-blowing.
translation.zh: 摄制组的道具手艺和挑选的人才 都太惊艳了

translation.en: Vast on every level. I mean, it was one of the biggest things
translation.zh: 每个层面的规模都很大 这是我们面临的最大挑战之一

translation.en: I think we've ever attempted
translation.zh: 这是我们面临的最大挑战之一

translation.en: in terms of the amount of characters, the sophistication of the characters,
translation.zh: 从人物数量 到角色复杂性

translation.en: and also, the challenge of recreating things that already exist.
translation.zh: 还要重塑一个已经存在的作品

translation.en: What fans of The Dark Crystal want is they want an odyssey, they want a saga,
translation.zh: 《黑水晶》的粉丝 想看到一部史诗之作 一个冒险故事

translation.en: they want something to enrich the universe of the original film,
translation.zh: 他们希望能看到原版电影中的宇宙世界再进化

translation.en: and that's what this series does.
translation.zh: 这些剧集版都做到了

translation.en: You could put them side by side,
translation.zh: 拿电影版和剧集版做比较

translation.en: and it is the same world,
translation.zh: 两者呈现的世界都是一样的

translation.en: but there's just so much of it to explore now.
translation.zh: 只是还有很多值得探索的部分

translation.en: [Lisa] Imagine if you are in the puppetry business,
translation.zh: 对于一个从事布偶行业的人来说

translation.en: whether as a puppeteer or a puppet builder,
translation.zh: 无论是布偶师还是布偶制作师

translation.en: what bigger opportunity is ever gonna come you way
translation.zh: 有什么机会比加入十集《黑水晶》摄制组

translation.en: than ten episodes of Dark Crystal?
translation.zh: 来得更美好呢？

translation.en: [narrator] A thousand years ago, this land was green and good,
translation.zh: 一千年前 大地一片绿油油 天下太平

translation.en: until the crystal cracked.
translation.zh: 直到水晶开始崩裂

translation.en: [Stephen] There's so much here that you don't know about.
translation.zh: 有太多不知道的事了

translation.en: There's an entire world to discover.
translation.zh: 这是个等待被发掘的世界

translation.en: [Brian] I was working in London for five years as a jobbing illustrator,
translation.zh: 我在伦敦当过五年的兼职插画师

translation.en: and I needed to do my own work,
translation.zh: 我需要有自己的作品

translation.en: but I didn't know exactly what that was.
translation.zh: 但我不知道从何开始

translation.en: But once I got the opportunity to move to the country here,
translation.zh: 后来有机会搬到美国

translation.en: then, immediately, the first thing I painted
translation.zh: 第一个作品就是一幅画

translation.en: was, indeed, this picture of a troll with trees behind it
translation.zh: 画中有个巨怪 后面都是树

translation.en: and a waterfall coming off its nose.
translation.zh: 一条瀑布从它口中流下来

translation.en: And that's what Jim saw.
translation.zh: 结果被吉姆看到了

translation.en: And I was a bit overcome, I think, meeting Jim,
translation.zh: 看到吉姆本人时 我表现得有点激动

translation.en: and I didn't know quite what to say or how to express myself,
translation.zh: 不知道该说什么 也不知道如何表达自己

translation.en: and it was his leap of faith.
translation.zh: 不过他对我有信心

translation.en: [Cheryl] My father really wanted to do an epic fantasy adventure.
translation.zh: 我父亲一直想做一个奇幻冒险故事

translation.en: He really enjoyed doing comedy.
translation.zh: 他也很喜欢做喜剧

translation.en: He enjoyed doing Muppets. He loved Sesame Street.
translation.zh: 他喜欢《大青蛙布偶秀》也喜欢《芝麻街》

translation.en: He loved the sort of fast, funny, vignette kind of variety show,
translation.zh: 他很喜欢这种轻松有趣天马行空的综艺节目

translation.en: but he wanted to do something that really told a complex narrative.
translation.zh: 不过他希望能做一些叙事比较复杂的作品

translation.en: [Brian] But quite quickly, we were hiring people that had other skills,
translation.zh: 我们很快就聘请了拥有其他技能的人才

translation.en: and Wendy was brought on board
translation.zh: 其中一个是文迪

translation.en: specifically for the Gelflings,
translation.zh: 文迪主要负责设计葛弗林人

translation.en: because Jim wanted that strong feminine thing.
translation.zh: 因为吉姆希望能创造出一个女性气质强烈的人物

translation.en: It was all about bringing a character to life,
translation.zh: 我们要让人物活起来

translation.en: all about creating something you've never seen before
translation.zh: 创造出观众从未见过的作品

translation.en: that he was hoping the audience would not only believe in,
translation.zh: 吉姆希望观众不仅会相信那个世界的存在

translation.en: but also scratch their heads and go, "How do you do that?"
translation.zh: 也要让他们抓脑袋地想：“你们是怎么办到的？”

translation.en: Hang on!
translation.zh: 抱紧了

translation.en: [Stephen] You have Brian Froud,
translation.zh: 摄制组请来了布莱恩弗劳德

translation.en: who is a guy who, for this world, these things are real.
translation.zh: 在他眼里 这个世界是真实存在的

translation.en: You have Frank Oz,
translation.zh: 也请来了弗兰克奥兹

translation.en: who is one of the most brilliant puppeteers who's ever lived,
translation.zh: 他是史上最出色的布偶师之一

translation.en: and you have Jim bringing the world-building, and the humanity,
translation.zh: 还有吉姆 他把世界架构、人性

translation.en: and the sense of human nature being put into these puppets.
translation.zh: 以及人文气息通通融入了这些布偶中

translation.en: It's a brilliant kind of creative melting pot
translation.zh: 整个作品犹如一个创意大熔炉

translation.en: that brought the original thing to life.
translation.zh: 赋予了这些原创人物生命

translation.en: [Taron] We live in an age of sequels and prequels,
translation.zh: 这个年代讲究续集和前传

translation.en: but the great thing about The Dark Crystal is
translation.zh: 但《黑水晶》的厉害之处是

translation.en: it's such a microcosmic look at the world that, when you finish watching it,
translation.zh: 那是个微观世界 每次看完后

translation.en: you're left with these massive questions
translation.zh: 我们都会对宇宙之大产生许多疑问

translation.en: about the universe at large which have never been answered.
translation.zh: 我们都会对宇宙之大产生许多疑问 到现在还未有解答

translation.en: [Cheryl] There are people who obsess about Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: 那些深深爱上《黑水晶》的人

translation.en: who really care about Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: 在乎这部电影的人

translation.en: and over the years, it's really become a cult film.
translation.zh: 经过许多年后 把它奉为邪典电影

translation.en: [Stephen] Is there going to be a feature film sequel?
translation.zh: 会不会有续集电影长片？

translation.en: Is there gonna be an animated TV show?
translation.zh: 会不会有动画电视剧？

translation.en: I don't think that you could have done
translation.zh: 我相信没有任何公司

translation.en: a new version of The Dark Crystal better than on Netflix
translation.zh: 比Netflix更适合重拍《黑水晶》

translation.en: with the right budget,
translation.zh: 提供足够的预算

translation.en: with the creative team that Henson assembled.
translation.zh: 也使用汉森所召集的创意团队

translation.en: I mean, it's so exciting to see the world come back to life in that way.
translation.zh: 很期待以这种方式看见这个世界回归

translation.en: All too often, projects are rebooted or remade based on an IP
translation.zh: 通常改编或重拍的原著作品

translation.en: where all the DNA of that thing that makes people love it is discarded.
translation.zh: 都会摒弃人们喜爱的所有元素

translation.en: But, for me, if you're going to remake or reboot a franchise,
translation.zh: 但在我看来 如果要翻拍原著

translation.en: go back to why people like it in the first place.
translation.zh: 就必须回到当初人们喜欢这部作品的原因

translation.en: [Cindy] Teddy Biaselli had told me that Henson were interested in doing an animated series of The Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: 泰德比亚塞利告诉我汉森有兴趣打造动画版的《黑水晶》

translation.en: and I thought about it, and I went home and I watched the movie again.
translation.zh: 我想了一下 然后回家重看电影版

translation.en: I kept thinking about it. I was, like, "Well the mythology is great,
translation.zh: 脑袋不停在转 我心想 “这是个非常精彩的奇幻故事

translation.en: but what makes it really special and transcendent is the puppets."
translation.zh: 但其特别和无可取代之处在于采用布偶”

translation.en: [Ted] I picked up the phone. I was, like, "Okay, good news, bad news.
translation.zh: 我拿起电话劈头就问：“好消息 还是坏消息？”

translation.en: Uh, bad news is, we're not gonna make The Dark Crystal animated series.
translation.zh: 坏消息是动画版《黑水晶》做不成

translation.en: The good news is Cindy wants to know what it would cost to do it live-action."
translation.zh: 好消息是欣蒂想知道 换成做真人版要耗资多少”

translation.en: And you could hear the phone hit the floor.
translation.zh: 我可以听到电话掉在地上的声音

translation.en: And we were shocked.
translation.zh: 我们都吓着了

translation.en: [laughs] Like, "Really? A series that looks like the film?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“真的吗？做一部跟电影一样的剧集”

translation.en: And, of course... of course we immediately responded
translation.zh: 我们当然马上就答应了

translation.en: that it's yes, like, it's technically possible,
translation.zh: 所以我们答复是：“好啊”技术上是办得到的

translation.en: but it will be very expensive.
translation.zh: 只是耗资太大了

translation.en: [Cindy] The best version of The Dark Crystal that could be made today, would be made by the Henson Company,
translation.zh: 唯有吉姆汉森公司能摄制出最佳版本的《黑水晶》

translation.en: by giving them the freedom
translation.zh: 前提是要给予他们自由

translation.en: to really reach for the best version they can possibly imagine.
translation.zh: 让他们打造出想象中最理想的版本

translation.en: -[gasps] -[laughs] Gelfling!
translation.zh: 葛弗林人

translation.en: And they picked up a teaser, a test,
translation.zh: 于是摄制组选了一个片段做测试

translation.en: to see what it looked like.
translation.zh: 看看结果如何

translation.en: [Lisa] Netflix could look at the test and see the same thing that we saw in it.
translation.zh: Netflix可以从测试中看到我们所看到的东西

translation.en: So what we had tried to do in the test
translation.zh: 在这段试片中

translation.en: was we did CG Gelfling with puppet Skeksis.
translation.zh: 我们采用动画手法处理葛弗林人史基斯人则采用布偶手法

translation.en: Trespasser!
translation.zh: 不速之客

translation.en: [Andy] Does it make sense to do a TV show in the same way that they did the original film?
translation.zh: 采用制作原版电影的手法来摄制剧集行不行得通？

translation.en: You know, how much has, of-- has technology progressed?
translation.zh: 科技进步到什么程度了？

translation.en: [Skeksis] What's that smell?
translation.zh: 这是什么味道？

translation.en: There's something disparate between a real tactile object that catches the light,
translation.zh: 一个实体物的感光表现

translation.en: that is layered and textured, versus something that is generated in a computer.
translation.zh: 所呈现出层次感和质感跟一个电脑绘制出来的动画是有差的

translation.en: And no matter how good it looks, no matter how good it looks,
translation.zh: 无论动画做得多好

translation.en: they looked like two different mediums.
translation.zh: 看起来就是两个不同的媒介体

translation.en: [Lisa] We could make a clean marriage between the two.
translation.zh: 我们大可结合这两种不同的技术

translation.en: And, technically, it could be done,
translation.zh: 从技术层面来说 这是行得通的

translation.en: but the CG Gelfling didn't look like Gelflings.
translation.zh: 只是电脑绘制的葛弗林人看起来不像葛弗林人

translation.en: [Ritamarie] No matter what you did with the eyes of the puppet,
translation.zh: 无论怎么修饰布偶的眼珠

translation.en: those puppet glass eyes were so hard to replicate in a CG environment,
translation.zh: 那种玻璃制成的眼珠是很难通过电脑成像技术复制的

translation.en: that you immediately could see
translation.zh: 观众马上看得出

translation.en: that it was CG talking to the puppet,
translation.zh: 那是电脑制作的角色在和布偶说话

translation.en: then you really just wanted to see the puppet.
translation.zh: 然后你真的就只想看布偶了

translation.en: [Erik] Seeing the tests that they did before the shoot with full CGI character and a puppet,
translation.zh: 看到了他们在开拍前制作的测试由全电脑制作的角色配合布偶出演

translation.en: it was... I mean, it's like night and day.
translation.zh: 区别实在是太大了

translation.en: It's amazing how much more evocative the... the puppet is.
translation.zh: 布偶能引起的共鸣感更强烈

translation.en: [Alice] As masterful as it is,
translation.zh: 无论动画有多精致

translation.en: you can't talk to a Pixar character in the real world.
translation.zh: 在现实世界中你是无法跟皮克斯动画人物对话的

translation.en: I mean, the percentage of the audience that gets to come
translation.zh: s

translation.en: and talk to a puppet in the real world is very small,
translation.zh: 虽然也非常少

translation.en: but I think you know that you could.
translation.zh: 但我觉得你知道这是可能的

translation.en: [Louise] We're going back to telling the story and what serves that,
translation.zh: 我们要回到从前用以前的方式说故事

translation.en: not just, "These effects are such fun,
translation.zh: 不仅仅是讲究特效

translation.en: let's-- how much more effects can we do?"
translation.zh: 或是要使用多少特效

translation.en: How do the effects serve the story? What can they tell?
translation.zh: 也讲究特效怎么辅助故事怎么讲述故事

translation.en: [Andy] CG, they can expand your world, they can enhance it and augment it,
translation.zh: 电脑成像能扩张这个世界 能增强和扩大这个世界

translation.en: and they can totally take it to places that just sets can't
translation.zh: 带我们去到一个实际片场去不到的地方

translation.en: and just puppets can't,
translation.zh: 布偶也去不到的地方

translation.en: but they can't be the star of the show, and they shouldn't be the star,
translation.zh: 但不足以成为整部剧集的主角 也不应该是主角

translation.en: because then you do lose that humanity, and it does jar you out of it.
translation.zh: 不然就失去人性了 让人觉得出戏

translation.en: And we all looked around at each other and said, "We're doing it all with puppets, guys."
translation.zh: 我们望着彼此齐声说：“都用布偶吧”

translation.en: And Double Negative, the studio that did the CG,
translation.zh: 而负责制作电脑动画的Double Negative公司则说

translation.en: said, "Well, hold on. We want to show you something."
translation.zh: “等一下 我们想让你们看些东西”

translation.en: Take just a shot from the movie, and then just manipulate it,
translation.zh: 他们拿了其中一个片段 稍微做了修改 增添少许光泽

translation.en: so you can add a little bit of blink or a little bit of smile,
translation.zh: 稍微做了修改 增添少许光泽 或是添加一点笑容

translation.en: and just take the performance from the puppet just that little bit further to add a bit more life to it.
translation.zh: 改善布偶的表现 为它们增添生命力

translation.en: And they augmented Kira's face a little bit.
translation.zh: 他们修饰了奇拉的脸

translation.en: That gave it a little bit more pop of life.
translation.zh: 使她看起来更栩栩如生

translation.en: And we all went... [snaps fingers] "That's it."
translation.zh: 我们看了齐声说：“这就对了”

translation.en: [Lisa] We, as a company, have been doing puppets for over 50 years,
translation.zh: 我们这家公司制作布偶已经有50年了

translation.en: and to be here at this point, so many years later,
translation.zh: 这么多年后 终于迎来这一天

translation.en: and be doing what has got to be the biggest puppet production ever.
translation.zh: 参与近年来制作规模最庞大的布偶戏

translation.en: This has no humans, so it is a complete puppet extravaganza.
translation.zh: 整部剧集没有人类角色可说是一部完全布偶出演的大戏

translation.en: My writing partner and I came up with a pitch for a sequel to Labyrinth,
translation.zh: 我和另一个编剧 为《魔幻迷宫》写了续集想要推出去

translation.en: and we called and we're like, "There's these two guys,
translation.zh: 于是打去吉姆汉森公司询问：“有两个编剧

translation.en: they have an idea for Labyrinth. Do you wanna hear it for a sequel?
translation.zh: 为《魔幻迷宫》写了续集要不要听听？”

translation.en: Henson Company was like, "No, but we're doing Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: 对方说：“不要公司在筹备《黑水晶》

translation.en: Would you want to come in on that?"
translation.zh: 你们有没有兴趣参与？”

translation.en: We're sitting there and this French gentleman comes in, says,
translation.zh: 那天我们坐在办公室突然有个法国人走进来说

translation.en: "Hello, I'm Louis, I'm here to meet with Lisa."
translation.zh: “我是路易 我来找丽莎

translation.en: And we realize we're pitching Lisa Henson
translation.zh: 我们发现讲演的对象居然是丽莎汉森

translation.en: and the guy who directed Hulk.
translation.zh: 以及《绿巨人》的导演

translation.en: And so, we have to suddenly act like we know what we're doing.
translation.zh: 我们必须马上假装知道自己在做什么

translation.en: We turn, look, and we see the archer, except the hunter--
translation.zh: 转过头来 看到弓箭手 不过猎人…

translation.en: [Blanca] The way they pitched the idea of the show was just so perfect.
translation.zh: 他们针对这部剧集提出的想法非常完美

translation.en: And it was so engaging.
translation.zh: 也充满了感染力

translation.en: It had high stakes, drama, intimacy,
translation.zh: 有高风险剧情 戏剧性 和亲密情感

translation.en: and, of course, great villains.
translation.zh: 当然也少不了厉害的奸角

translation.en: So, we were all really in awe,
translation.zh: 我们都感到非常惊艳

translation.en: and our... our hearts were full of joy
translation.zh: 也很开心能找到对的人

translation.en: to see that we found the right person to bring this back to life again.
translation.zh: 也很开心能找到对的人 来复活这部电影

translation.en: And as he falls back,
translation.zh: 当他往后跌倒时

translation.en: and that is where Aughra manages to emerge...
translation.zh: 奥古拉传来的信息就出现了

translation.en: [Carolina] The level of passion and excitement when they're telling a story
translation.zh: 他们说故事时的热情和兴奋

translation.en: had us engaged right away.
translation.zh: 马上就感染了我们

translation.en: So when they spoke the story to us, we were, like, all leaning in.
translation.zh: 所以在他们给我们讲故事的时候 我们都全神投入

translation.en: We're like, "What is this? What is this?" And that transferred onto the page.
translation.zh: 我们心想：“这也太厉害了” 那个故事后来被搬到剧本中

translation.en: If you weren't incredibly familiar with the original film
translation.zh: 如果对原著电影不够熟悉

translation.en: and didn't have a passion for it,
translation.zh: 没有热忱

translation.en: it might be too hard to decide how to build up this very elaborate prequel.
translation.zh: 就很难决定怎么为这个充满延伸性的前传铺陈

translation.en: We're looking at telling ten hours of modern television,
translation.zh: 这是一部十个小时的剧集

translation.en: and it's 30 years after the original Dark Crystal came out.
translation.zh: 原版电影在30年前推出

translation.en: So, we can't just live with the idea that we're introducing a new world,
translation.zh: 因此我们不能硬说 这是一个全新的世界

translation.en: the world has existed for 30 years.
translation.zh: 毕竟那个世界已经存在30年了

translation.en: So, we had to break a lot of the narrative conceits of the film,
translation.zh: 因此我们必须要依据很多电影中的叙事和画面

translation.en: a lot of the visual conceits of the film, and be free to do that.
translation.zh: 因此我们必须要依据很多电影中的叙事和画面 再发挥创意

translation.en: [Will] And so you can't go into that with like, "And here's how I'd do it."
translation.zh: 我们不能随便说 “这是我的做法”

translation.en: You gotta go in with like,
translation.zh: 我们要…

translation.en: "Okay, what do you like about what you're doing,
translation.zh: “为什么要这么做？

translation.en: [stammers] what needs a little more life, what needs a little fleshing out,
translation.zh: 哪个部分需要更多生命力？ 哪个部分需要补充？

translation.en: what's got too much fleshing out?"
translation.zh: 哪个部分补太多了？”

translation.en: [Ted] Jeff and Will, brilliant writers,
translation.zh: 杰夫和威尔是非常出色的编剧

translation.en: never worked on television before in their life.
translation.zh: 只是不曾为剧集写剧本

translation.en: We weren't about to literally throw them in the deep end
translation.zh: 我们不会直接把他们推入深渊

translation.en: without any sort of help.
translation.zh: 不给他们提供帮助

translation.en: So I go into the meeting, and I'm ushered into Lisa Henson's office.
translation.zh: 于是我去开会 我被带到丽莎汉森的办公室里

translation.en: And there's Lisa, and Halle, and Blanca.
translation.zh: 办公室里有丽莎、荷莉和布兰卡

translation.en: And he came in and he didn't know what he was there for. He was excited though.
translation.zh: 他走进办公室 不知道自己来干什么但显得满心期待

translation.en: And we said, "We're gonna show you something."
translation.zh: 我们说要给他看些东西

translation.en: [Javier] And then they show me this five-minute trailer that they shot
translation.zh: 接着她们让我看了一段五分钟的预告片

translation.en: as a proof of concept.
translation.zh: 作为概念验证

translation.en: And the story's been told enough times that I'm not entirely sure what happened.
translation.zh: 视频中的故事并不陌生 我不太确定是怎么回事

translation.en: [Halle] He was so excited and so happy.
translation.zh: 他表现得非常兴奋和开心

translation.en: I think he man-cried. I mean, I think he basically man-cried.
translation.zh: 好像流下了男人泪 他好像真的流下了男人泪

translation.en: I think on the outside I was able to keep a good poker face,
translation.zh: 表面上我可以保持一副宠辱不惊的样子

translation.en: but on the inside, I went into like a full-on, ugly man-cry
translation.zh: 可是我内心里男人泪决堤了

translation.en: for, like, my lost innocence, and my childhood, and for all the things I'd loved as a kid.
translation.zh: 我为失去的童真而泣也为童年时期所爱的事物而泣

translation.en: And I couldn't say no to the job. It was just one of those things, like,
translation.zh: 我抗拒不了这个工作邀约 面对这种工作邀约 我会说：“给我一美元 我也愿意接下”

translation.en: you could offer me a dollar... [laughs] and I'm gonna do this job, you know?
translation.zh: 面对这种工作邀约 我会说：“给我一美元 我也愿意接下”

translation.en: [Will] The minute he walked in the room, you knew
translation.zh: 他一踏入办公室 就看得出他是那部电影的铁粉

translation.en: he was a huge fan of the property.
translation.zh: 就看得出他是那部电影的铁粉

translation.en: and he was a huge fan of process.
translation.zh: 也是个热爱挑战的人

translation.en: He immediately set a tone of professionalism and nerd joy.
translation.zh: 他马上拿出专业的口吻整个人乐傻了

translation.en: Are you nuts? Why would you re-make something so great?
translation.zh: “你们有病吗？” 原著够精彩 何必翻拍呢？

translation.en: Uh, and then I read the script.
translation.zh: 接着我开始读剧本

translation.en: And then I saw they're making it into a TV series and it was a prequel.
translation.zh: 发现摄制组有意将它拍摄成剧集 而且是个前传

translation.en: I saw the people that were involved and I thought, "Oh, I get it.
translation.zh: 我看了摄制组名单 心想：“我懂了

translation.en: You're really digging deep into the world and you can do so many more things now."
translation.zh: 你们在往这个世界深处挖掘 因此能发挥更多创意”

translation.en: [Lisa] Louis came to us a long time ago
translation.zh: 路易很早以前就找过我们

translation.en: because he wanted to know what we were doing with The Dark Crystal
translation.zh: 他想知道我们打算怎么处理《黑水晶》

translation.en: at the time we were developing a feature film.
translation.zh: 当时我们正筹备拍摄长片

translation.en: He jumped on board the feature film and worked with us on that development
translation.zh: 于是他加入了长片摄制组 跟我们一起策划

translation.en: on how to do Dark Crystal for today.
translation.zh: 怎么拍摄这个年代的《黑水晶》

translation.en: And he is the one person on the whole show who... who has the show in his head.
translation.zh: 整个摄制组中只有他知道片子怎么拍

translation.en: He's incredibly thoughtful,
translation.zh: 他是个非常细心的人

translation.en: and I feel like he's really the right person
translation.zh: 我认为他非常懂得

translation.en: to be standing in my father's shoes from the original movie,
translation.zh: 站在我爸拍摄原版电影的角度思考

translation.en: where people can, like, ask him,
translation.zh: 人们大可问他

translation.en: "All right, what are we doing here?" [laughs] You know?
translation.zh: “为什么？”

translation.en: He... he's that person who knows.
translation.zh: 他是那个知道答案的人

translation.en: [Javier] The Dark Crystal was heavy with the weight of legacy.
translation.zh: 《黑水晶》背负着传承经典的重担

translation.en: Legacy because all of us grew up with Jim Henson.
translation.zh: 被奉为经典是因为我们都看着吉姆汉森的作品长大

translation.en: Legacy because The Dark Crystal was a huge movie
translation.zh: 被奉为经典是因为 《黑水晶》是影迷心中的巨作

translation.en: for a lot of us who love cinema and especially who love genre cinema.
translation.zh: 《黑水晶》是影迷心中的巨作 特别是热爱小众电影的人

translation.en: But the trick is to find that sweet spot where you still are able to be honest,
translation.zh: 只是要找出要点 同时保持真诚

translation.en: you're still able to be respectful, and you're still able to be creative.
translation.zh: 尊重原著之余 也能发挥创意

translation.en: [Lisa] Louis is not a writer,
translation.zh: 路易不是编剧

translation.en: um, but he was in the writing room the whole time.
translation.zh: 不过他经常待在编剧室里

translation.en: So, we did a writing room in Los Angeles with Jeff, and Will, and Javier,
translation.zh: 我们在洛杉矶腾出了一间编剧室 里面有杰夫、威尔和贾维尔

translation.en: and Jo Lee, and Vivian.
translation.zh: 以及J.M.李和维维恩李

translation.en: We had a nice team of writers.
translation.zh: 他们都是出色的编剧

translation.en: And then, Louis worked with them even closer,
translation.zh: 路易跟他们紧密合作

translation.en: and you know, rarely left the room.
translation.zh: 很少离开编剧室

translation.en: [Vivian] Will and Jeff had already thought of the ten episodes,
translation.zh: 威尔和杰夫已经想好了十集的内容

translation.en: so they did a lot of the heavy lifting for us.
translation.zh: 帮我们减轻了不少压力

translation.en: So, we knew where we were going.
translation.zh: 也让我们清楚方向

translation.en: There was so much communication,
translation.zh: 我们需要经常沟通

translation.en: about where the canon was going,
translation.zh: 弄清楚剧情走向

translation.en: and sort of what were important aspects to make sure that we didn't change,
translation.zh: 找出重要部分 坚持不去改变它们

translation.en: or things that we did make sure that were the tent poles.
translation.zh: 也确立主干情节的元素

translation.en: [Lisa] Jo Lee is writing the YA books,
translation.zh: J.M.李是青年小说作家

translation.en: and he's a big world creator.
translation.zh: 他创造了一个大世界

translation.en: We've used a lot of what he developed in his YA books
translation.zh: 我们利用了许多他在青年小说中延伸出来的故事

translation.en: as texture and background for the story that the series tells.
translation.zh: 作为剧情脉络和背景

translation.en: Writing the novels, it was a lot about, like, making up place names, and character names, and environments,
translation.zh: 写小说很多时候需要为地点、人物和环境取名

translation.en: and now, I'm just one piece in a very big picture.
translation.zh: 而如今我成了这个大世界里的一小部分

translation.en: What was this incredible civilization that the Skeksis wiped out?
translation.zh: 史基斯人到底摧毁了一个怎么样的伟大文明？

translation.en: That world building which sort of occurred across the YA novels
translation.zh: 青年小说和图文漫画里

translation.en: and across the graphic novels,
translation.zh: 所创造的那个世界

translation.en: you know, we kind of just created, like, that civilization,
translation.zh: 仿佛就是一个文明

translation.en: which is a matriarchal society.
translation.zh: 这个文明以母系氏族为主

translation.en: Seven clans which are each run by their own Maudra,
translation.zh: 七大氏族各自为家 以莫德为首

translation.en: who's the matriarch,
translation.zh: 也就是女族长

translation.en: and then all the Maudras.
translation.zh: 再来还有莫德长老

translation.en: The queen of all of them is the All-Maudra.
translation.zh: 她是七大氏族的女王

translation.en: And she is of the Vapra Clan,
translation.zh: 她来自瓦普拉氏族

translation.en: so we actually created seven different clans
translation.zh: 我们创造了七大氏族

translation.en: which are not based on any human culture,
translation.zh: 这个文明与人类文化无关

translation.en: but what they're a little bit based on
translation.zh: 唯一的共同点是

translation.en: is the way that human cultures are different from each other.
translation.zh: 人类各族文化各有千秋

translation.en: [Simon] Certainly, in science fiction and fantasy,
translation.zh: 在科幻故事中

translation.en: you have realms whereby you can rehearse ideas
translation.zh: 我们确实可以打造出不同时空在里面实践各种理念

translation.en: that might not necessarily be possible in the real world.
translation.zh: 而且这些理念不一定非要在现实世界中行得通

translation.en: You can actually present power struggles
translation.zh: 我们可以体现出各种权力斗争

translation.en: or at least environments where things aren't necessarily dictated by the gender politics of the now, here,
translation.zh: 或是不被当代性别政治所主导的架空世界

translation.en: and to show how changes can occur.
translation.zh: 并将其演化体现出来

translation.en: [Halle] High fantasy, like all good storytelling,
translation.zh: 史诗奇幻故事跟其他好故事一样

translation.en: has a character story, has a plot story that drives the action.
translation.zh: 有一个人物为主的故事 也有一个牵动整个剧情的主线

translation.en: But the thing I think high fantasy can do
translation.zh: 不过我认为史诗奇幻故事

translation.en: probably better than any type of storytelling
translation.zh: 比其他故事类型做得更理想的部分

translation.en: is it can send that bigger, overall message,
translation.zh: 就是奇幻故事能传达出更宏伟的理念

translation.en: not only to bringing people into this wondrous new world,
translation.zh: 除了把人带入这个奇幻新世界

translation.en: but also speaking to some issues right now that, uh, we all are feeling very strongly.
translation.zh: 也贴近我们当下最关切的议题

translation.en: And seeing it in myth, and a new myth, it's gonna be very exciting.
translation.zh: 这些议题透过神话反映出来 令人非常期待

translation.en: [Natalie] It pulls on that idea of unity against an overriding darkness and evil.
translation.zh: 这个故事强调团结对抗处于优势的黑暗势力和恶魔

translation.en: All storytelling is about who we are, and what we do,
translation.zh: 所有故事都在叙述我们是谁我们的所作所为

translation.en: and how we behave, and what choices we make.
translation.zh: 我们的行为举止和决定

translation.en: Uh, and sometimes it's naturalistic, sometimes it's through a fantasy prism.
translation.zh: 有时候是天性使然 有时候是通过幻想

translation.en: But with this, when it's through creatures that don't look like us,
translation.zh: 片中的生物长得不像人类

translation.en: from a world that is so far away from us,
translation.zh: 而且来自一个遥远的世界

translation.en: it makes us let our guard down.
translation.zh: 足以让我们放下了心防

translation.en: We don't notice that we're really talking about how human beings behave.
translation.zh: 没意识到我们其实在叙述人类的行为

translation.en: [Javier] What are the tent-pole moments we have to hit?
translation.zh: 哪些主干情节不能少？

translation.en: We know that the pilot is the Gelfling discover
translation.zh: 我们知道第一集讲述葛弗林人

translation.en: that the Skeksis are draining the Gelfling for their essence.
translation.zh: 发现史基斯人图谋抽干葛弗林人的菁华

translation.en: So we know that's the inciting incident.
translation.zh: 我们知道这是导火线

translation.en: You know, we know, we know, we know.
translation.zh: 很多情节我们都知道了

translation.en: So you start putting those tent poles up on a white board,
translation.zh: 于是我们开始把这些主干情节写在白板上

translation.en: and what that gives you is,
translation.zh: 最后形成了一个…

translation.en: it gives you, if not a road map, a set of destinations.
translation.zh: 可以说是路线图总之我们看见了每个目的地

translation.en: And the creativity comes out of
translation.zh: 然后创意就出现了

translation.en: you sit in a room, and this is how we did Lost also.
translation.zh: 大家坐在编剧室里集思广益跟以前做《迷失》时一样

translation.en: You sit in a room day after day, and go, "Okay, how do we get
translation.zh: 我们天天坐在编剧室里思考怎么从A点走到B点

translation.en: from point A, to point B, to point C, to point D?"
translation.zh: 我们天天坐在编剧室里思考怎么从A点走到B点 再到C点和D点？

translation.en: Next thing you know, you have a season of television.
translation.zh: 马上就凑成了一季剧集

translation.en: And from there, that's when you build a world.
translation.zh: 按照剧本打造一个世界

translation.en: If you... you create a character such as...
translation.zh: 假设我们要创造一个人物

translation.en: I'm gonna use an example like Brea.
translation.zh: 以布瑞为例

translation.en: So, she's a princess, which means there's a mother who's a queen,
translation.zh: 她是个公主 意味着她母亲是女王

translation.en: which means, oh, there's a hierarchy, this, uh, legacy that she has to live.
translation.zh: 也意味着这个世界存在阶级现象 她必须继承传统

translation.en: What's that landscape like?
translation.zh: 那她住的地方是什么样子的呢？

translation.en: It's just a slow unravel,
translation.zh: 整个世界渐渐显现出来

translation.en: and it's very beautiful, and it's very delicate.
translation.zh: 那是个非常美丽和细致的世界

translation.en: We wanted to make sure that we also had a love story at its core.
translation.zh: 我们也希望以一个爱情故事为主轴

translation.en: And it's the story of Rian and Deet.
translation.zh: 也就是莱恩和迪特的故事

translation.en: And I think that these two characters need to meet
translation.zh: 这两个人物必须相遇

translation.en: and go on this journey together.
translation.zh: 一起展开冒险之旅

translation.en: That's it! Monsters.
translation.zh: -我知道了 怪物！-什么？

translation.en: -What? -I know exactly what to do now.
translation.zh: -我知道了 怪物！-什么？ 我知道该怎么做了

translation.en: You've been so helpful. Thanks so much.
translation.zh: 你帮了我一个大忙 感激不尽

translation.en: The language of Podling
translation.zh: 波丁人的语言

translation.en: was created by Jo Lee,
translation.zh: 是J.M.李创造的

translation.en: who's one of our writers on the show and who had a background in linguistics.
translation.zh: 他是其中一个编剧 拥有语言学背景

translation.en: And he handed me a neat little vocabulary packet
translation.zh: 他把一本完整的小词典交给我

translation.en: of all the Podling and English words,
translation.zh: 里面尽是波丁语和英语单词

translation.en: and so I learned it by studying Jo Lee's diligent work.
translation.zh: 我研究J.M.李的著作从中学习波丁语

translation.en: [J.M.] He's done a huge amount to breathe life into it.
translation.zh: 他创造了很多词汇也赋予了这个语言生命力

translation.en: He'll write me emails in Podling,
translation.zh: 他用波丁语给我写了一封电邮

translation.en: and I'm like,"I don't... I don't know what that says."
translation.zh: 我心想：“这是在写什么？”

translation.en: Like... [laughs] I made up the language, but I'm not fluent in it.
translation.zh: 这个语言是我创造的我本人竟然不熟悉

translation.en: So, it's very inclusive for everyone.
translation.zh: 每个人都积极参与

translation.en: Every idea on this counts,
translation.zh: 每个想法都不能忽略

translation.en: like, figuring out how is he gonna shoot that arrow,
translation.zh: 例如弓箭手要怎么射箭

translation.en: because he also had four hands and he can go like this.
translation.zh: 毕竟他有四只手 他可以这么射

translation.en: Having written a Star Trek movie, I know what it's like when you write,
translation.zh: 我曾为《星际迷航》写剧本 我知道编剧笔下的“某个星球上的某种地形”是什么情况

translation.en: And you know someone's gonna have to go build that, or design it or, or all of those things.
translation.zh: 总会有人负责去建造或设计这些场景

translation.zh: 我以为日后会成为这方面的人才

translation.zh: 马上就打给所有感兴趣加入的人

translation.zh: 告诉他们这件事 毕竟这是再酷好不过的事

translation.zh: 以为这次不会遇上困难

translation.zh: 因此有很多限制

translation.zh: 头部依然需要添加许多操控机制

translation.zh: 也确保手有足够的空间操控布偶的嘴形

translation.zh: 就必须加强他们的眼神和皮肤质感

translation.zh: 我现在已经忘记了

translation.zh: 当初担心葛弗林人布偶做得不够好的感觉

translation.zh: 不过我父亲以前确实非常担心这点

translation.zh: 所以才想采用演员出演《魔幻迷宫》

translation.zh: 别误会了 原著本身就充满了奇幻魅力

translation.zh: 以前人们用人手把木头刻成手指

translation.zh: 造型设计基本上是基于原版电影

translation.zh: 用线把牙齿固定在下面

translation.zh: 但是必须考虑到布偶师要套在手上好几个小时

translation.zh: 皮肤的材料是泡沫乳胶

translation.zh: 这种材质非常轻盈 而且有弹性

translation.zh: 翻过来可以看到皮肤表层细节

translation.zh: 所以基本上有两个模具

translation.zh: 采用玻璃纤维制成

translation.zh: 里面会植入机械

translation.zh: 皮肤内层的形状

translation.zh: 跟头颅外层的形状是一样的

translation.zh: 假设把这个人物的头颅切成一半

translation.zh: 就形成了一个托盘

translation.zh: 我可以开始在这个托盘上进行建造

translation.zh: 这是主要人物奥古拉的布偶

translation.zh: 这是复制品

translation.zh: 采用泡沫乳胶制成

translation.zh: 就跟原版电影一样

translation.zh: 里面是奥古拉难看的牙齿

translation.zh: 凯文用手这么抓住它

translation.zh: 为布偶增添另一层表情

translation.zh: 科技进步是好事很多事以前办不到 如今却办到了

translation.zh: 但回归根本

translation.zh: 布偶依然是要把手伸进头里操控的东西

translation.zh: 接着用粘土把它们雕塑出来

translation.zh: 手上掌握着一个乐器 弹奏出美妙的乐曲

translation.en: and all the myths.

translation.zh: 我们只是在通过现代科技来复活这一传统

translation.zh: 我们渴望探索的各种幻想故事情节

translation.zh: 边画边写 有时会用橡皮泥做模型

translation.zh: 两岁那年 第一次通过电视看布偶戏时

translation.zh: 跟我目前所做的事

translation.zh: 意外地凑成一个圆 我目前所做的事跟当初启发我的事是一样的

translation.zh: 我目前所做的事跟当初启发我的事是一样的

translation.zh: 布偶是个媒介体

translation.zh: 因此可以稍微拉开距离 赋予更多思考空间

translation.zh: 而不是紧盯着屏幕入神

translation.zh: 这是我们彩排的第一场布偶戏

translation.zh: 每次教人演布偶戏时 要注意三个要素

translation.zh: 很高兴当时有其他人在场

translation.zh: 这可是个浩瀚的宇宙

translation.zh: 你们知道把手高举起来撑住五分钟有多幸苦吗？

translation.zh: 布偶师都是这么办的头上顶着一个约9到14公斤重的布偶

translation.en: and then acting emotionally and...
translation.zh: 同时要演出情绪

translation.en: you know, you take on the emotions of the character that you're playing.
translation.zh: 他们必须把情绪融入扮演的人物中

translation.en: It's... it's intense.
translation.zh: 不容易

translation.zh: 我在读剧本时心想 “天啊 这要用上演技

translation.zh: “天啊 这要用上演技

translation.zh: 不是搞笑的布偶戏”

translation.en: To come to this, we had to learn another language,
translation.zh: 要演出这些角色我们必须学习另一种语言

translation.en: because the Gelflings, particularly, require stillness,
translation.zh: 因为扮演葛弗林人讲究沉稳

translation.en: precision...
translation.zh: 精准

translation.en: subtlety.
translation.zh: 含蓄

translation.en: That pendant belongs to the...
translation.zh: 这属于…

translation.en: [Taron] You indulge in an illusion.
translation.zh: 我们都沉浸在这种幻觉中了

translation.en: Everyone apart from the youngest members of the audience
translation.zh: 除了年轻观众以外每个观众都知道

translation.en: know that they are looking at an inanimate object.
translation.zh: 这些都是没有灵魂的物体

translation.en: But through a collection of great performers and great makers,
translation.zh: 不过在精湛的演技和手工技术下

translation.en: the audience are able to invest in this thing
translation.zh: 观众得以投入

translation.en: and believe it's real life,
translation.zh: 并相信眼前之物是活的

translation.en: and there's something really magic about that.
translation.zh: 这存在着某种奇妙的力量

translation.en: To bring these characters to life, first you look at them,
translation.zh: 要让这些人物活起来 第一件事就是望着它们它们是被创造出来的

translation.en: 'cause they're already created, unlike when acting on screen
translation.zh: 第一件事就是望着它们它们是被创造出来的 不像我们在镜头前表演

translation.en: and you chose your costume, the way you walk, move.
translation.zh: 穿着戏服举手投足

translation.en: There's the way that they look,
translation.zh: 它们有不同的外型

translation.en: and then there's a huge part of it that is dictated by the puppeteer.
translation.zh: 大部分角色表现都掌控在布偶师手上

translation.en: They decide when the character's suddenly shouting, aggressive,
translation.zh: 由他们决定人物什么时候突然大喊什么时候激动起来

translation.en: or whether they look like they're taken aback by something.
translation.zh: 或是表现出一副被吓着的样子

translation.en: And so, the performance really takes place within certain parameters that are... are shaped a lot by the puppeteer,
translation.zh: 因此整个表演在某种程度上都要依赖布偶师

translation.en: which is why Louis has been working with them as actors.
translation.zh: 所以合作过程中路易把他们当成演员

translation.en: [Alice] I have to eventually come to the point with every character
translation.zh: 我必须把自己训练到可以在不假思索下

translation.en: where I can make faces without thinking,
translation.zh: 做出不同角色应有的表情

translation.en: and I think happy and my hand just does it.
translation.zh: 一想到开心 手就做出相应的动作

translation.en: As I'm showing you this, she's...
translation.zh: 我让你们看看 她在…

translation.en: she's...
translation.zh: 她在…

translation.en: you know, she's thinking, she's emoting, she's...
translation.zh: 她在思考 她在传达感情 她在…

translation.en: You know, she can be scared, she can be...
translation.zh: 她被吓着了 她在沉思

translation.en: thoughtful, she can... she can be sad.
translation.zh: 她被吓着了 她在沉思 她也可以表现出难过的样子

translation.en: [Victor] When someone else is doing your eyes
translation.zh: 在眼神由另一个人操控的情况下

translation.en: and you have a sad moment where you close the eyes,
translation.zh: 这是悲伤时的表现 布偶闭上眼睛

translation.en: and then, when you come out of it,
translation.zh: 当它抬头时

translation.en: either they have to kind of catch it when you come up,
translation.zh: 对方必须看准你抬头的时机让它睁开眼睛

translation.en: or maybe they come out early and that forces you to come up,
translation.zh: 或是它提早睁开眼睛布偶师就要马上让它抬头

translation.en: but because I'm controlling it, it all feels real
translation.zh: 但因为操控布偶的人是我所以我感受得到那股真实感

translation.en: and the timing feels real.
translation.zh: 时机也到位

translation.en: With a Muppet, you're so used to going like that.
translation.zh: 布偶师习惯这样操控布偶

translation.en: Now, on these things, that doesn't quite look right.
translation.zh: 但用同样的方式操控这些布偶就不行了

translation.en: It looks like he's riding a horse to Banbury Cross,
translation.zh: 这会让它看起来像是策马奔腾

translation.en: but it is just the movement translating from your own walk
translation.zh: 布偶的动作和布偶师的脚步一致

translation.en: with a bit of something in it to make him work.
translation.zh: 再加一点变化 这样看起来更自然

translation.en: And just keeping them ali--
translation.zh: 也让布偶活起来

translation.en: I found when I'm performing Rian,
translation.zh: 每次操纵莱恩这个角色时

translation.en: it's almost like I can't let him keep still.
translation.zh: 我不能完全让它静止不动

translation.en: I have to, while I'm with him,
translation.zh: 我在操纵它时

translation.en: I just have to sort of just change the weight of where he's standing.
translation.zh: 我必须稍微调整它脚下的着力点

translation.en: I'm not afraid.
translation.zh: 我不怕

translation.en: Naturally, when she looks around, the shoulders kind of go with her,
translation.zh: 它望向四周时 肩膀自然也会一起动

translation.en: but I don't think that looks very natural.
translation.zh: 我认为这看起来不自然

translation.en: So, if I have an assist, I'll get them to do both hands
translation.zh: 如果有个助手我会叫对方操纵双手的动作

translation.en: and I'll hold her body still.
translation.zh: 我则负责稳住它的身体

translation.en: Puppets are funny because they can kind of do nothing...
translation.zh: 布偶是一种有趣的玩意它们动作不大

translation.en: but make you believe they're doing everything.
translation.zh: 却让观众相信它们是活的

translation.en: So, like, just a... just a tilt of the head
translation.zh: 例如它稍微偏头

translation.en: and you read an emotion,
translation.zh: 观众就可以看懂它的情绪

translation.en: like, uh, down is sad, for instance.
translation.zh: 例如它往下看 观众就知道它难过

translation.en: So, it's just playing with the camera, and the light, and the positioning,
translation.zh: 在摄影、灯光和站位的辅助下

translation.en: and you can really sell any emotion.
translation.zh: 布偶可以做出任何情绪表现

translation.en: It's really difficult and exacting, and it's very precise.
translation.zh: 非常不容易和费劲 操作务必精准

translation.en: And so, when they get a moment where your whole job
translation.zh: 哪天我们只需负责

translation.en: is to, like, be a half naked Podling running through the forest,
translation.zh: 扮演衣衫不整的波丁人在森林里跑来跑去

translation.en: they're, like, "Then I'm gonna go all the way with that."
translation.zh: 摄影师会说：“那就一镜到底吧”

translation.en: And, uh, we're probably gonna be in the suits for a great deal of time today,
translation.zh: 我们可能就要套着布偶一整天

translation.en: because it's a long scene.
translation.zh: 毕竟是个长镜头

translation.en: So this is challenging.
translation.zh: 所以是个挑战

translation.en: We clamber in here alongside them, like snuggling.
translation.zh: 我们趴在布偶下面像依偎在它们身上一样

translation.en: And I rest my head in Warrick's armpit.
translation.zh: 我的头就靠在华威柯的胳膊下

translation.en: Well, the Skeksis are bodysuits.
translation.zh: 史基斯人布偶基本上就是连体衣

translation.en: It's like a rucksack. They're sort of harnessing it on you,
translation.zh: 像个系在身后的背包

translation.en: then our hands go up through the head
translation.zh: 然后我们把手伸进头部

translation.en: and we're operating like this.
translation.zh: 以这种姿势操作

translation.en: [Victor] I think what I'll do is just, uh...
translation.zh: 我就…

translation.en: Hi, I'm in a Skeksis.
translation.zh: 嗨 我在史基斯人体内

translation.en: -Isn't it fun? -[laughter]
translation.zh: 有趣吧？

translation.en: It's very dark and sweaty in here. Yay.
translation.zh: 里面又暗又热

translation.en: [Warrick] Uh, so this is the Chamberlin's body.
translation.zh: 这是御前大人的身体

translation.en: Um, it looks quite small,
translation.zh: 看起来挺小的

translation.en: but actually, it's bigger than they originally were in the movie.
translation.zh: 但其实比原版电影的史基斯人来得大

translation.en: Or so we're told.
translation.zh: 我们也是听说的

translation.en: Louise Gold knows this because she was there for both the movie and series.
translation.zh: 露易丝戈德知道这点因为原版电影和剧集她都有参与

translation.en: We also have a monitor, small monitor strapped to us,
translation.zh: 我们身上也系着一个显示屏

translation.en: because, as puppeteers, and in Jim's way of working,
translation.zh: 作为木偶师 根据吉姆的做法

translation.en: we are seeing exactly what the camera sees.
translation.zh: 显示屏上的画面就是镜头拍摄的画面

translation.en: So, we're in some way directing.
translation.zh: 在某个程度上 我们也是导演

translation.en: We can see exactly what we're doing.
translation.zh: 毕竟我们可以看到自己的一举一动

translation.en: We have these shoulder straps.
translation.zh: 这是肩带

translation.en: And then, in the belly of the beast...
translation.zh: 这是怪兽的肚子

translation.en: we have our monitor.
translation.zh: 显示屏就在这边

translation.en: We're watching two shots simultaneously,
translation.zh: 我们同时看着两个镜头

translation.en: and pretty much, most of the time, a third camera,
translation.zh: 通常都是第三个镜头

translation.en: which is like a CCTV.
translation.zh: 就像闭路电视镜头一样

translation.en: [Warrick] This is Yergin.
translation.zh: 他是约金

translation.en: Yergin.
translation.zh: 约金

translation.en: Pretty tight squeeze.
translation.zh: 很窄

translation.en: It is. [laughs]
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: So there are a series of buckles.
translation.zh: 有很多扣子

translation.en: -All right, you good? -Yeah, I'm good.
translation.zh: -可以吗？-可以

translation.en: -Got the weight? -That's me, I'm in.
translation.zh: -抓稳了吗？-进去了

translation.en: Gerard will put the head on.
translation.zh: 杰拉德将为我戴上头部

translation.en: It takes a village to get a Skeksis on.
translation.zh: 穿上史基斯人布偶要劳动整村人

translation.en: And, um, I will put my hand up in here.
translation.zh: 我把头装上了

translation.en: Thank you very much, Yergin.
translation.zh: 约金 多谢了

translation.en: -I'm sure that's fine. -No, no, no. One thing.
translation.zh: -我相信不会有问题-还不行 差一个步骤

translation.en: No? One more thing? What?
translation.zh: 什么？还差一个步骤？

translation.en: Open wide.
translation.zh: 把嘴张开

translation.en: -[Yergin] There you go. -Ah, tasty.
translation.zh: -行了-真美味

translation.en: Working a Skeksis is extremely hard.
translation.zh: 操作史基斯人实在不容易

translation.en: It's the hardest puppet I've ever performed in my entire career.
translation.zh: 那是我整个职涯中碰上最难操作的布偶

translation.en: But then, it's really, uh, freeing,
translation.zh: 但也非常自在

translation.en: because once you're inside that puppet, you just can't be seen from head-to-toe.
translation.zh: 毕竟一钻进布偶里后 从头到脚都被遮蔽起来

translation.en: You're invisible and that character lives.
translation.zh: 看不见布偶师 人物也就活起来了

translation.en: [Simon] Particularly when you have a skilled puppeteer as Warrick
translation.zh: 尤其像华威柯这种布偶操作技术超强的人 他能做出细微的表情动作

translation.en: who does all those little head moves and stuff, and...
translation.zh: 他能做出细微的表情动作

translation.en: You can see how he's talking when you're watching the playback.
translation.zh: 看重播时 可以看得到人物的嘴形

translation.en: I've got a lot of help from all over the place, yeah.
translation.zh: 身边的人给了我不少帮助

translation.en: Warrick's interpretation, his movements.
translation.zh: 我看了华威柯怎么诠释人物和动作

translation.en: The incredible sort of visuals that I'm looking at.
translation.zh: 这些画面令我感到不可思议

translation.en: I was certainly trying to follow on from Frank's performance in the movie
translation.zh: 我当然有参考弗兰克在电影中的表演

translation.en: and... and get that kind of...
translation.zh: 企图表现出…

translation.en: sleazy, snaky, fluid movement.
translation.zh: 那种慵懒、阴险和流畅的动作

translation.en: It's a really distinct performance.
translation.zh: 他的表演太厉害了

translation.en: This is good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Yes, Emperor will be most pleased.
translation.zh: 大王肯定龙颜大悦

translation.en: -I go now. Bye, bye. -Wait!
translation.zh: 太好了 等一下

translation.en: [gasps] Yes?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: [Lisa] Everything is designed to fit in Brian Froud's aesthetic,
translation.zh: 每件道具都是根据布莱恩弗劳德对美感的诠释而设计

translation.en: and if he didn't design it himself, he's weighed in on everything himself.
translation.zh: 即便不是他的设计 他也会负起全责

translation.en: And he did design every puppet character and every costume.
translation.zh: 不过每个人物和造型设计确实都出自他手

translation.en: [Toby] That's where it all begins. It starts with Brian's line.
translation.zh: 这就是起点 一切从布莱恩下笔的第一条线开始

translation.en: The pencil line that he draws on the page, the curve that he'll use.
translation.zh: 他用铅笔画在画页上的线条和曲线

translation.en: [Brian] In the lines I draw,
translation.zh: 我笔下的线条

translation.en: there's something about them that have to encapsulate life.
translation.zh: 必须植入生命力

translation.en: You know, there's a line,
translation.zh: 这是一条线

translation.en: and it might have a flow to it
translation.zh: 这条线必须有起伏上下

translation.en: and it feels all right.
translation.zh: 而且恰到好处

translation.en: But we're going to have to turn this into three dimensions.
translation.zh: 不过摄制组要把素描变成立体

translation.en: We're gonna have to get somebody to sculpt this,
translation.zh: 所以我们会找人按照素描做雕像

translation.en: and they're gonna have to put in the wrinkles.
translation.zh: 然后在表面上刻画皱纹

translation.en: And they can't just put in wrinkles...
translation.zh: 但不能随便把皱纹…

translation.en: ...any way they like.
translation.zh: 刻在雕像上

translation.en: It's trying to get people to understand is,
translation.zh: 我要让摄制组明白

translation.en: you are gonna sculpt these wrinkles in this character
translation.zh: 我们把这些皱纹都刻画在人物脸上

translation.en: because they have to have a meaning.
translation.zh: 每一条皱纹都要有意义

translation.en: All the wrinkles...
translation.zh: 所有皱纹…

translation.en: there are no superfluous wrinkles.
translation.zh: 没有一条是多余的

translation.en: What is the character of this thing?
translation.zh: 这个人物有什么个性？

translation.en: It tells you something about it,
translation.zh: 皱纹能显现出来

translation.en: and so, they have to listen
translation.zh: 因此摄制组要明白

translation.en: to, not my drawings anymore,
translation.zh: 这已经不是我的素描了

translation.en: but, actually, what the character is that you're trying to reach.
translation.zh: 重点是摄制组要怎么彰显人物个性

translation.en: [Toby] For him to come and revisit this world and get back into it
translation.zh: 要他重新回到这个世界 融入其中

translation.en: might have been a challenge,
translation.zh: 可能是个挑战

translation.en: but a rewarding one.
translation.zh: 但成就感极大

translation.en: [Brian] I don't picture things in my head.
translation.zh: 我很少用脑袋去想象

translation.en: Can't do it. I can't sit and picture it in the head,
translation.zh: 我办不到 我不能坐着想象

translation.en: and then just draw it.
translation.zh: 因此只能画出来

translation.en: To get to my subconscious,
translation.zh: 为了进入潜意识

translation.en: to get rid of the chattering mind,
translation.zh: 排除吵杂声

translation.en: I'll just scribble.
translation.zh: 我就直接乱涂

translation.en: And it's... and it's like looking at nature
translation.zh: 就像望着大自然

translation.en: and trying to see a face in the... in the.. in the bark of a tree.
translation.zh: 设法从树干上找到一张脸孔

translation.en: Somewhere in here, I've got to find...
translation.zh: 我必须设法从这块空白中

translation.en: what... what that is.
translation.zh: 找到某种东西

translation.en: The challenge is...
translation.zh: 难处在于…

translation.en: it's got to be different, but it's got to be meaningful.
translation.zh: 既要不同 也要有意义

translation.en: How do you find meaning in a line?
translation.zh: 要怎么从线条中找到意义？

translation.en: [Toby] To be able to see that stuff come out, and see those things work,
translation.zh: 能见证从零到有 看到一切走入正轨

translation.en: and characters come alive once again...
translation.zh: 所有角色再次活过来

translation.en: or to be able to talk to him and find out, you know, about things from the original,
translation.zh: 或是有机会跟他交流 了解原版电影的点点滴滴

translation.en: on how he interprets something or sees something.
translation.zh: 以及他如何诠释或理解某个部分

translation.en: I mean, that's the magic.
translation.zh: 就够不可思议了

translation.en: [Jeff] I think it's amazing that the whole Froud family has kind of come back. Like...
translation.zh: 看到弗劳德一家再次走进大家的视野感觉太美妙了

translation.en: to see the three of them working together is incredible.
translation.zh: 看到他们三个人一起工作的画面我感到不可思议

translation.en: And to see him...
translation.zh: 看到他…

translation.en: watch his son... follow in sort of the family business.
translation.zh: 望着儿子传承这个家族企业…

translation.en: But it's not even the family business, it's like the family world.
translation.zh: 这也不是家族企业 而是一个家族环境

translation.en: [Toby] That's where I think we're sort of thriving in this fact
translation.zh: 我想这就是我们成功的因素

translation.en: is the fact that we're...
translation.zh: 毕竟…

translation.en: you know, we're in this world that's so natural to us as a family
translation.zh: 这是我们一家人习以为常的世界

translation.en: that we're able to... to just impart what we know, or what we actually just know to be real.
translation.zh: 所以我们才得以把知识和真实感传承下去

translation.en: As I grew older, I found that I had the Froudian style, as we call it,
translation.zh: 随着年龄增长我发现自己也有弗劳德家的遗传

translation.en: um, where it felt comfortable and it felt like home.
translation.zh: 做起道具来得心应手就像待在家一样

translation.en: [Taron] I went into the creature workshop, and it's still the Frouds who are creating
translation.zh: 我走进道具工作室 发现这些不可思议的外星生物

translation.en: these wonderful other-worldly creations,
translation.zh: 依然出自弗劳德家之手

translation.en: and here's Brian Frouds' son who is doing a lot of the work in there.
translation.zh: 看到布莱恩弗劳德的儿子 在工作室里忙碌

translation.en: And I was like a fanboy meeting him, because he's the baby from Labyrinth.
translation.zh: 我就成了一个小粉丝 他就是《魔幻迷宫》里的那个宝宝

translation.en: So then, the duality of not only seeing someone
translation.zh: 等于是一举两得 我看见一个

translation.en: from a film that I loved as a child,
translation.zh: 出现在我儿时热爱的电影中的人

translation.en: but then also seeing his creative prowess and this incredible work he's doing.
translation.zh: 还能见识到他高超的创作能力 以及他所打造的作品

translation.en: It was just fantastic to go and get a glimpse of all that.
translation.zh: 能见着这一切 感觉太不可思议了

translation.en: [Peter] You have to take something that's spiritual, and creative, and beautiful to look at, i.e. Brian's designs,
translation.zh: 我们要使用灵魂创意和美感去欣赏布莱恩的作品

translation.en: and then somehow translate them and actually create a puppet that works.
translation.zh: 然后把它们转化成有生命力的布偶

translation.en: A sculpture that is gonna work technically, mechanically for the puppeteer,
translation.zh: 打造出一个无论在技术层面机械层面都符合布偶师需求的塑像

translation.en: as well as visually look correct,
translation.zh: 在视觉层面也不能有差池

translation.en: and-- and capture the spirit that was in Brian's drawings.
translation.zh: 才能体现出布莱恩为素描赋予的灵魂

translation.en: Generally, we get one of two versions of designs when we have designers.
translation.zh: 大致上设计师会发来两种不同的造型设计

translation.en: It's either a maquettes, maquettes are the small sculptures,
translation.zh: 我们收到可能是小模型小模型是指小型雕像

translation.en: and Toby Froud was providing those.
translation.zh: 这些都出自托比弗劳德之手

translation.zh: 这些小模型非常有帮助 让我们可以观察到作品的立体面向

translation.en: of what you're creating.
translation.zh: 让我们可以观察到作品的立体面向

translation.en: And Brian Froud was sending sketches,
translation.zh: 而布莱恩弗劳德发来的是素描

translation.en: and he's got a very loose style.
translation.zh: 他的画风非常懒散

translation.en: So, luckily for us, Toby Froud is with us,
translation.zh: 幸好有托比弗劳德在

translation.en: and he's known his father his whole life.
translation.zh: 他这辈子都在跟父亲处在一起

translation.en: Imagine! So, he could interpret what the squiggles meant.
translation.zh: 想象一下所以他才知道怎么诠释这些线条

translation.en: [Brian] What they were doing is very, um, kindly
translation.zh: 他们非常贴心

translation.en: trying to tidy my drawings up.
translation.zh: 试着梳理我的素描

translation.en: They were trying to, um, even everything up.
translation.zh: 确保不会有任何差池

translation.en: And once they understood it's meant to be asymmetrical,
translation.zh: 当他们理解到某些不对称的部分是刻意设计的

translation.en: it's meant to be growing, and organic, and have a flow to it,
translation.zh: 某些部分需要成长、是活的 有自己的律动感

translation.en: it just became simple and it just...
translation.zh: 一切就变得简单易明了

translation.en: -everything fell into place from then on. -[man] Yeah.
translation.zh: 从那一刻起 一切水到渠成

translation.en: Sometimes we weren't understanding exactly the direction design-wise.
translation.zh: 有时我们并不理解造型设计的明确方向

translation.en: We weren't hitting it.
translation.zh: 行不通

translation.en: And then, he said, "That's it.
translation.zh: 他就会说 “没错 就往另一个方向”

translation.en: What I want is other."
translation.zh: “没错 就往另一个方向”

translation.en: [Toby] And again, it's that journey.
translation.zh: 毕竟这是一个旅程

translation.en: It's just believing and trusting,
translation.zh: 只要信任 只要相信

translation.en: and as soon as it happens, you will get on,
translation.zh: 时机一到 马上抓紧

translation.en: and then it just moves.
translation.zh: 一切就迎刃而解了

translation.en: [Gavin] The process of designing something like this does start
translation.zh: 设计这些人物的第一步 当然是参考原版电影

translation.en: with looking back at the old film, obviously.
translation.zh: 当然是参考原版电影

translation.en: That's what you're trying to reproduce, that spirit, and push it further.
translation.zh: 我们要再次塑造出同样的灵魂还要比以前更好

translation.en: Obviously, Brian Froud was... was very much with Jim Henson,
translation.zh: 对于原版电影的造型设计

translation.en: the architect of that early product.
translation.zh: 布莱恩弗劳德和吉姆汉森的想法非常接近

translation.en: And Brian is still around. You know, he's been quite involved.
translation.zh: 如今布莱恩依然健在 也热衷参与制作过程

translation.en: We were all a bit nervous at the beginning of obviously, meeting him and talking to him,
translation.zh: 起初大家见到他跟他沟通时都有点紧张

translation.en: knowing that we were sort of holding his baby.
translation.zh: 毕竟我们手上掌握着他的作品

translation.en: [Brian] Jim really was intrigued by ley lines,
translation.zh: 吉姆非常喜欢灵脉的纹路

translation.en: and then there is a sacred geometry.
translation.zh: 也喜欢神秘几何图腾

translation.en: And what it did was give the original film a depth.
translation.zh: 这些元素为原版电影增添了深度

translation.en: [Blanca] We made sure that both in the script
translation.zh: 我们确保 剧本和艺术部门

translation.en: but also in the art department production
translation.zh: 剧本和艺术部门

translation.en: that all those symbols and all that language,
translation.zh: 融入这些符号和语言

translation.en: that it had layers,
translation.zh: 从而展现层次感

translation.en: and that it had, therefore, life.
translation.zh: 然后赋予人物生命

translation.en: Brian has done some wonderful, uh, drawings on the Skeksis.
translation.zh: 布莱恩为史基斯人画了一些漂亮的素描

translation.en: And you'll see little kind of bug-like creatures,
translation.zh: 于是我们看到了一个类似昆虫的生物

translation.en: you know, on these circles, and triangles, and everything.
translation.zh: 被圆形和三角形的符号围绕着

translation.en: And I took those, and from them I sketched
translation.zh: 我把这些符号取来重画

translation.en: about... well in the end, we ended up with about 54 symbols.
translation.zh: 最后总共拟出54个符号

translation.en: from which we said, "Okay, this is our Skeksis alphabet."
translation.zh: 我们看了说：“这就是史基斯人的字母表”

translation.en: And so... we eventually...
translation.zh: 这些符号都记载在这本宝典里

translation.en: made it to here, which is the--
translation.zh: 这些符号都记载在这本宝典里 也就是…

translation.en: This is the aggression symbol, which is the big Skeksis symbol.
translation.zh: 这是主要符号 象征着史基斯人

translation.en: And then it... it opens...
translation.zh: 打开来看

translation.en: It's a very aggressive... object.
translation.zh: 里面都是非常刺激的图文

translation.en: So, you try and... you try and read...
translation.zh: 逐页翻阅

translation.en: some of this, and then it...
translation.zh: 可以看到这一页 然后…

translation.en: then it just springs open.
translation.zh: 还可以打开来

translation.en: To put together a fantasy universe on paper... is a lot of work,
translation.zh: 将一个幻想世界具体化需要很多心力

translation.en: but then, to do the details of the fantasy world... practically...
translation.zh: 但要把幻想世界做到细致入微严格来说…

translation.en: First of all it's fun, but it's a lot of work.
translation.zh: 虽然好玩 但非常耗力

translation.en: So, the artistry of it's huge.
translation.zh: 因此整个艺术作业非常庞大

translation.en: [Jason] First, I came in and met Louis,
translation.zh: 我来找路易时 一走进片场

translation.en: and I looked at the screen and they ran a bit,
translation.zh: 他们用显示屏放了一个片段

translation.en: and I was taken aback. I was just side-swiped by the scale and majesty of it.
translation.zh: 我整个人惊呆了我被片场规模之大深深地震撼了

translation.en: How it looked like a gigantic Hollywood special effects movie.
translation.zh: 看起来就像在拍摄一部好莱坞大型特效电影

translation.en: I hadn't expected, I guess, that level of effort and artistry.
translation.zh: 我没想到要投注这么庞大的心力和艺术作业

translation.en: I had no idea of the, uh... the kind of epic nature of the show.
translation.zh: 我起初并没有想到这部剧集的规模有多强大

translation.en: [Louis] More rocks would create a little bit of a...
translation.zh: 用石头在斜道上做一扇门

translation.en: -you know, a gate for the ramp. -[Gavin] No, that will work well.
translation.zh: 用石头在斜道上做一扇门 那就行得通了

translation.en: [Erik] I just feel like it's such a luxury
translation.zh: 有机会在这个世界中拍摄

translation.en: to be allowed to shoot in this world
translation.zh: 是一种奢侈

translation.en: that's not only so rich and full of details,
translation.zh: 片场处处都是细节

translation.en: but that is, of course, just handmade from scratch for this.
translation.zh: 而且都是从零开始手工打造的

translation.en: [Simon] Often when you watch a film or a special effects movie, you'd say, "How do they do that?"
translation.zh: 每次观赏特效电影时我们会问：“他们是怎么办到的？”

translation.en: With this, you know how they do it, it's just incredible how they do it.
translation.zh: 有了场景 就知道是怎么办到了 只是他们也太厉害了

translation.en: They had about 30 to 35 sets on Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: 以前摄制组打造了30到35个布景

translation.en: and they had about three years prep.
translation.zh: 前前后后耗了三年

translation.en: We have about 70, 80 sets,
translation.zh: 我们要打造70到80个布景

translation.en: and we had about six months prep.
translation.zh: 只有六个月的时间筹备

translation.en: So, your first, other than creative, thought is about a schedule.
translation.zh: 除了创意以外我们还要赶得上竣工日

translation.en: Is about how do we work this?
translation.zh: 要怎么交差？

translation.en: We were prepping this from when we started pre-production,
translation.zh: 我们从前制期就开始筹备布景了

translation.en: making the trees, the plants, the vines that are hanging up.
translation.zh: 先做树和植物以及到挂在树上的藤蔓

translation.en: And then, there's all the prop-made plants that we based most of them from the original movie.
translation.zh: 这些植物道具的造型都是取自原版电影

translation.en: We got all the old photos and reference of all those crazy little plants that were in Dark Crystal.
translation.zh: 我们参考了旧版《黑水晶》里所有奇葩植物的旧照和图鉴

translation.en: [Ty] Every piece that you see in here,
translation.zh: 我们所看到每个布景

translation.en: we've actually copied from the original film.
translation.zh: 都是取自原版电影

translation.en: We actually got the original drawings.
translation.zh: 我们把原图弄来了

translation.en: The original drawings, yeah, original photographs,
translation.zh: 我们把原图和原照弄来了

translation.en: even the original concept models of the original sculpts.
translation.zh: 就连原版模型和雕像也一并弄来

translation.en: Richard and Ty jumped into the Froud sensibility very... like, they went in feet first.
translation.zh: 里查德和老泰很快就跟弗劳德达到感性共识

translation.en: I mean, that... there's an original Skeksis sword
translation.zh: 这是原版史基斯人的剑

translation.en: when this is actually copied from the original one.
translation.zh: 取自原版电影

translation.en: I mean, they're beautiful.
translation.zh: 太美了

translation.en: It's obviously Brian Froud who designed those.
translation.zh: 显然出自布莱恩弗劳德笔下

translation.en: [Taron] There's a real joy in knowing that every detail has been... completely, lovingly crafted,
translation.zh: 得知每个细节都是经过精心打造

translation.en: and there's something akin to a great painting.
translation.zh: 好比如勾勒一副伟大画作感觉令人心旷神怡

translation.en: There's something wonderful about knowing you can pause any frame
translation.zh: 无论定格在哪一帧每一刻都经过精心设计

translation.en: and know that no moment in there is an accident.
translation.zh: 这是令人欢欣鼓舞的事

translation.en: Every leaf you see has been placed there.
translation.zh: 每一片叶子都是用人手别上去的

translation.en: Every movement of the character has been considered.
translation.zh: 每个人物动作都是经过考量

translation.en: To invest in creating an entire other world,
translation.zh: 将心力投注在创造一个架空世界

translation.en: down to the smallest details of what its flowers look like, and its food stuffs,
translation.zh: 不放过每个微妙细节从花和食物的造型

translation.en: to the constellation of the planetary alignments of the cosmos that it holds,
translation.zh: 到整个宇宙的星宿排序每个细节都考量在内

translation.en: you are transported to an entirely different landscape
translation.zh: 这等于来到另一个截然不同的世界

translation.en: which overwhelms you.
translation.zh: 令人感到震撼

translation.en: [Will] I turned to Jeff at one point and said,
translation.zh: 有一回我望着杰夫说

translation.en: "Boy, we'd better be careful what we write."
translation.zh: “小子 我们写剧本要小心”

translation.en: Because, you know, we just put, like, uh, "exterior, balcony,"
translation.zh: 毕竟如果我们写出类似“露台外景”的布景设置

translation.en: and then we get into, "What are they talking about on the balcony?
translation.zh: 然后开始写剧情 “他们在阳台聊什么？

translation.en: What's the plot? What's the story? What are the characters on the balcony?"
translation.zh: 剧情是什么？哪些人物出现在露台？”

translation.en: And then you look, and this balcony wraps around,
translation.zh: 之后我们就会看到片场出现一座巍然蜿蜒的露台

translation.en: and it's 300 feet long,
translation.zh: 大概90米长

translation.en: and you're just, like, "Who thought of that? It's beautiful."
translation.zh: 我们看了直问：“是谁想出来的？太美了”

translation.en: [Gavin] One of the big ones was the citadel, the throne room, for the Ha'rar Gelfling Clan,
translation.zh: 另一个大型布景是首都哈拉的葛弗林族王座室

translation.en: and completely new world, very important, it's the head clan.
translation.zh: 那是个截然不同的重大布景因为是七大氏族之首的王座室

translation.en: We went through quite a few different incarnations of what that needs to be,
translation.zh: 我们看了好几个不同的诠释

translation.en: trying to hold within the budget,
translation.zh: 努力不让成本超出预算

translation.en: because anything with a compound curve that isn't a straight line
translation.zh: 因为凡是有复合曲线的设计只要不是直线

translation.en: is more expensive than something with a straight line.
translation.zh: 价格都会比较高

translation.en: [Phil] We had Machu Picchu, which was our inspiration for this.
translation.zh: 我们的设计灵感取自马丘比丘古迹

translation.en: This was a town that was up in the heavens.
translation.zh: 这个耸立在云端的城市

translation.en: Well, it was fantastic to see those environments practically,
translation.zh: 看见这些实际布景不被镜头框架局限

translation.en: um, not framed for the camera,
translation.zh: 我觉得不可思议

translation.en: because you could see the mechanics of it.
translation.zh: 我们可以看见整个操作情形

translation.en: The fact that they had to be built so high so that the puppets could go inside.
translation.zh: 工作人员必须把布景建在高处 这样才能把布偶放进去

translation.en: So our standard height here, we have four-foot-high rostrums.
translation.zh: 标准高度有了 平台有1米高

translation.en: There's the finished set floor and then the set sits on top,
translation.zh: 工作人员把布景建在平台上

translation.en: and that's so we can open up the floor to drop the puppeteers in
translation.zh: 平台可以打开 然后把布偶伸出去

translation.en: to have the creatures at the right height.
translation.zh: 确保它们高度正确

translation.en: That doesn't happen on a normal show.
translation.zh: 平常拍摄剧集没有这种情形

translation.en: So, you've got the creature's complexity, you've got the complexity of the set,
translation.zh: 我们要处理片中生物的造型复杂性 也要注意片场的复杂性

translation.en: so you have to map out in great detail which creature's gonna move where
translation.zh: 我们先要拟出细节 搞清楚片中生物的移动方向

translation.en: to provide the right type of flooring or open up the flooring.
translation.zh: 使用适合的地板材质或是确定要打开哪一块地板

translation.en: [Richard] On another film where you're not making everything,
translation.zh: 拍摄其他影集时不必什么都动手做

translation.en: I'll-- I'll run around and find everything,
translation.zh: 我会到处去找需要的道具

translation.en: book it from the rental companies or buy it, and then...
translation.zh: 要不向道具租借公司订做要不去买 然后…

translation.en: But with this, on a daily basis, we're constantly making pieces.
translation.zh: 但这部剧集不同我们天天都在制做道具

translation.en: [Gavin] And not just at human scale.
translation.zh: 这种工作量不是一般人办得到的

translation.en: There's nothing that could be really hired or purchased.
translation.zh: 这些道具都无法租用或采购

translation.en: Sculpting's been our biggest thing on this.
translation.zh: 雕刻是打造道具的主要手艺

translation.en: I mean, literally, everything you see has been sculpted.
translation.zh: 目光所及的道具都是雕刻出来的

translation.en: I mean, we concepted this and from--
translation.zh: 设计概念来自…

translation.en: And it's very Froudian, as you can see. I mean it's beautiful.
translation.zh: 不难看得出来这是弗劳德的设计 非常漂亮

translation.en: [Richard] With like any piece of art, you can keep going and going.
translation.zh: 跟所有艺术品一样我们可以不停地投入工作

translation.en: You have to just say that's your time, this is where we've got to be,
translation.zh: 只要讲明时限 说明什么时候可以完成

translation.en: and plan, you know, those five weeks of where each week they want to be at.
translation.zh: 将接连五周的工作策划好 确保每周都完成既定的阶段

translation.en: From archives, original photographs,
translation.zh: 从草图到原图

translation.en: we've been able to scale up, draw off,
translation.zh: 我们得以扩而充之、去芜存菁

translation.en: and take all the information off the original
translation.zh: 同时参考原版电影的资料

translation.en: and get it as close as we possibly can.
translation.zh: 尽可能做得越相似越好

translation.en: [Ty] And the reason there's this massive hole here
translation.zh: 这边有个大洞

translation.en: is for the puppeteer, obviously, to... to work the puppet.
translation.zh: 是腾给布偶师操控布偶的空间

translation.en: Purely fiberglass piece, polyester resin,
translation.zh: 纯玻璃纤维制成主要原料是聚酯树脂

translation.en: and then we're having to again down to the painters now
translation.zh: 然后送去上色

translation.en: to do the finishing, and then onto set.
translation.zh: 再做修饰 最后才送往片场

translation.en: And that's the continuing train of work.
translation.zh: 这是一个马不停蹄的过程

translation.en: [Peter] Everybody came together for the common good.
translation.zh: 每个人分工合作往一个共同目标前进

translation.en: And Gavin, the production designer, was amazing.
translation.zh: 加文是个出色的美术指导

translation.en: And him and his team, they produced the most gorgeous sets I think I've seen ever.
translation.zh: 他和他的团队合力打造出我从未见过的精美布景

translation.en: [Javier] When you put something on a page,
translation.zh: 开始策划后

translation.en: more than 100 people are gonna come to work on the show and create that thing.
translation.zh: 摄制组就会召集上百人参与整个摄制过程 从而创造出一部作品

translation.en: More so in The Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: 《黑水晶》也是

translation.en: because it is a completely synthetic universe.
translation.zh: 整部剧集描述一个完全虚构的世界

translation.en: Everything that we write has to be made by somebody, and it's by hand.
translation.zh: 我们所写的一切都会经过人手打造

translation.en: It's pushing that back into a handmade quality and feel,
translation.zh: 回归到讲究手艺和质感的做法

translation.en: and it's the hardest thing to do.
translation.zh: 可以说是难上加难

translation.en: The film was so rich and vibrant in every single frame,
translation.zh: 原版电影每一帧都丰富多彩

translation.en: and to do that across a TV show is a huge problem.
translation.zh: 如今转而拍成剧集整个摄制过程就是一大问题

translation.en: [Javier] When you look at every little detail in The Dark Crystal,
translation.zh: 看着《黑水晶》里的每个细节

translation.en: you look at the books in that library,
translation.zh: 例如藏书阁里的图书

translation.en: you look at the vials in the scientist's chamber,
translation.zh: 科学家实验室里的小瓶

translation.en: uh, those things are the apex of somebody's art.
translation.zh: 这些细节都是某个人的鬼斧神工

translation.en: [Lisa] You're looking at a set that's all Styrofoam,
translation.zh: 这个布景全是保丽龙打造而成

translation.en: but it looks like parquet wood,
translation.zh: 但看起来却像拼花木

translation.en: it looks like stone, it looks like marble because the painting is so incredible,
translation.zh: 石头、大理石 毕竟画工太精湛了

translation.en: and, at the same time, in the creature shop,
translation.zh: 与此同时 生物道具部门的人

translation.en: we have people who are putting in individual hairs.
translation.zh: 与此同时 生物道具部门的人 正在把毛发一根根地植入布偶

translation.en: The Landstrider has hair all over its body.
translation.zh: 阔行兽全身上下都是毛发

translation.en: Every one was hand-punched.
translation.zh: 根根都是用手工植入的

translation.en: [Finola] The main kind of color of hair around here is just one pattern piece.
translation.zh: 这个部位的毛发颜色与其他部位是一致的

translation.en: And then, we've gone through it
translation.zh: 以此类推

translation.en: and, um, put other types of fur through it to kind of break it up a little bit.
translation.zh: 并参杂好几种不同性质的毛发 让毛发稍微蓬起来

translation.en: But the pattern had a direction on it
translation.zh: 不过都要梳往同一个方向

translation.en: so that we can have-- have it sticking up as much as possible
translation.zh: 尽可能让毛发竖起来

translation.en: like the original one.
translation.zh: 跟原版电影里一样

translation.en: So you use like a beading needle that's far down,
translation.zh: 我们会用穿珠针植入毛发

translation.zh: 水晶之主保护真相水晶

translation.zh: 单看配音阵容就足以说明一切

translation.zh: 豪华配音阵容背后藏着一群布偶师和操偶师

translation.en: and, um, it's a team eff-- like, it's genuinely a team effort.

translation.zh: 摄制组来自世界各地拥有不同文化背景

translation.en: You'll get a sense of a big, eclectic world.

translation.zh: 这是水晶出现的那一刻 （配乐师 丹尼尔彭博顿）

translation.zh: 水晶下来时 我们会听到这个声音

translation.zh: 这是配合水晶登场的配乐

translation.en: And there's an instability to sound.
translation.zh: 我们可以听到声音的不稳定性

translation.en: This is kind of connected to the crystal and the, uh, Skeksis.
translation.zh: 主要配合水晶和史基斯人登场

translation.en: In a way, it's a very uncomfortable sound.
translation.zh: 可以说是听起来很不舒服的声音

translation.zh: 再来是这个声音

translation.en: a sound you wouldn't associate with an orchestra.
translation.zh: 这是一种不会令人联想到交响乐的声音

translation.en: It's just a very unusual sound.
translation.zh: 总之是非常不寻常的音乐

translation.en: [Daniel] The Dark Crystal world always felt, to me, like from a different time.
translation.zh: 我感觉《黑水晶》里的世界像是存在于另一个时空

translation.en: I sort of felt, musically, I wanted to incorporate as many different elements from all types of musical culture into the score.
translation.zh: 因此我希望在配乐中融入许多不同音乐文化的元素

translation.en: I also wanted to give it a simplicity in way,
translation.zh: 也希望能使用简练的配乐来营造气氛

translation.en: because a lot of early instruments, they often--
translation.zh: 因为许多早期的乐器

translation.en: they might not even have a chromatic scale,
translation.zh: 根本没有所谓的半音音阶

translation.en: they might have quite a simple scale on them.
translation.zh: 可能只有一个简单的音阶

translation.en: And by limiting yourself to more of just a smaller range of notes,
translation.zh: 在限制使用更多音符的情况下

translation.en: it starts to feel, hopefully, more authentic.
translation.zh: 希望能带出更真实的感觉

translation.en: I want it to feel like this music could have been made in Thra.
translation.zh: 我要让人觉得这种音乐源自于瑟拉

translation.en: Cast him out.
translation.zh: 他们会把他赶出去

translation.en: How can they not?
translation.zh: 怎么不会呢？

translation.en: To believe him is not to believe themselves.
translation.zh: 相信他就等于怀疑自己

translation.en: [Daniel] And so, the idea with that is we can use it in lots of different ways through the show.
translation.zh: 我们可以用这种形式为各种场景打造不同的配乐

translation.en: [Skeksis] Thra belongs to us now.
translation.zh: 瑟拉已经属于我们了

translation.en: And is nothing... nothing Gelfling can do!
translation.zh: 葛弗林人无能为力

translation.en: The first time we were going round set, we would just find all these,
translation.zh: 第一次去参观片场时 我们看到了许多不可思议的道具

translation.en: like, mad objects,
translation.zh: 我们看到了许多不可思议的道具

translation.en: and we were like, "Oh, wow!" You could just... It was so tactile.
translation.zh: 心想：“天啊 太真实了”

translation.en: And I think that's a really important word in this.
translation.zh: 我认为在这个作品中“真实”是个关键词

translation.en: If the music can feel as tactile as everything else,
translation.zh: 如果配乐也能跟那个世界一样真实

translation.en: then we've sort of succeeded.
translation.zh: 就算成功了

translation.en: [Daniel] I think everyone involved in this show
translation.zh: 我认为每个参与这部剧集的人

translation.en: has put so much work and effort
translation.zh: 都在每个细节上

translation.en: into every minute detail.
translation.zh: 投入了许多心力

translation.en: I think every department,
translation.zh: 我认为每个部门

translation.en: from, you know, sound, to costume design,
translation.zh: 从音乐部门到戏服设计部门

translation.en: to story, to set building, the puppeteers,
translation.zh: 从编剧、建造布景到操作布偶

translation.en: everyone is putting something
translation.zh: 每个人都投入了心力

translation.en: that most of us wouldn't even know what-- what is going into it.
translation.zh: 多数人都不知道成果如何

translation.en: And that's what makes the show so special, I think, because...
translation.zh: 这就是这部剧集如此特别的原因 毕竟在创意方面 这是前所未见的

translation.en: it's creatively like... unlike anything else you've seen.
translation.zh: 毕竟在创意方面 这是前所未见的

translation.en: [Jason] Nobody's making films with puppets anymore,
translation.zh: 如今已经没有人拍摄布偶戏了

translation.en: the world's greatest puppeteers.
translation.zh: 这些人都是世界顶级布偶师

translation.en: They're working at the very top of their game.
translation.zh: 这是他们职涯中最耀眼的成就

translation.zh: 他为这个作品打灯和拍摄

translation.en: And so, uh, it's a look that you've never seen before.
translation.zh: 这是前所未见的情景

translation.zh: 我肯定没见过这种情景

translation.zh: 不要走到我看不到你的地方我会在另一边

translation.zh: 摄制作业看似简单 那是错觉

translation.en: and that's the great joy of it, you know,
translation.zh: 但这种辛苦能换来大大的幸福

translation.zh: 因为有一群人 带着热忱 辛勤地工作

translation.zh: 在短时间内创造出观众喜欢的作品

translation.zh: 路易太棒了 他…

translation.en: I don't know how he does it. He almost immediately got how a movie like this is made.
translation.zh: 我不知道他怎么办到的他马上就明白了这种电影要怎么摄制

translation.en: I really love the fact that he embraced our methodology so wholeheartedly.
translation.zh: 我很高兴他全心全意地接受我们的做法

translation.en: I felt he was always, you know, behind us. He was championing what we were doing.
translation.zh: 我感觉他一直在支持我们 甚至在我们之上

translation.en: Swings in, that makes it ring.
translation.zh: 挥剑 让它响起来
